ygData.subject: Re: Guild
ygData.msgSnippet: who had the thesaurus, can we find another word that means synergy, sounds as cool, but not as modern ...i would hate to sound like a corporate psychologist
ygData.messageBody:
who had the thesaurus, can we find another word that means synergy,
sounds as cool, but not as "modern"...i would hate to sound like a
corporate psychologist :)

-joe

On Thu, 29 Jul 1999, David Lari wrote:

> From: David Lari <kerik@...>
>
> I do have to say I agree Synergy sounds to modern. It is one of those
> industry buzzwords like paradign. <Paradign of Synergy> :) But I will go
> along with it if most others like it.
>
> "J. W Cash" wrote:
>
> > From: "J. W Cash" <racooneyes@...>
> >
> > Well, the other suggestion last night was Voices of Tolerance. I'm not
> > real keen on the word Synergy. Not only did I hate Jem growing up, but
> > the word sounds to modern for a fantasy game. Just my 2cp.
> >
> > J.
